creator: BoxCox BVBA
descriptionHtml:
Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

We believe you can never have too many friends: wherever you go, you should be able to integrate: diversity is what makes us richer, and exploring is never done. Our goal is to give you the confidence to broaden your horizons and embrace your passions.

Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.

We are not here to invade your life, we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

descriptionShort: Friends based on interests. Meaningful experiences. Smart group matching.
title: UNBLND - chat, meet, make new friends

creator: BoxCox BVBA
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to meet people who share your interests and make a lasting connection? If yes, you are in the right place. UNBLND makes it easy to find a group of people who are perfect for you, and you for them. Moved to a new city/country? Want to find new friends? Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink? Make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

 UNBLND is a global social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences 

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it! 

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!

Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!
Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.

What makes us different from other social networks?
- Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
- It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
- We have super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
- Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
- You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life


YOUR PRIVACY 

 UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

Privacy Policy: 
https://unblnd.com/privacy

Frequently Asked Question:
https://unblnd.com/faq-help-center

Follow us: 
https://facebook.com/unblnd 
https://twitter.com/unblnd 
https://instagram.com/unblnd
https://linkedin.com/company/unblnd/

descriptionShort: Friendship app based on interests. Meaningful experiences. Smart group matching.
title: UNBLND - chat, meet people & make new friends

creator: BoxCox BVBA
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to meet people who share your interests and make a lasting friendship?


If yes, you are in the right place. UNBLND makes it easy to find a group of people who are perfect for you, and you for them. Moved to a new city/country?✈ Want to find new friends? Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink?🥂 Join meetup groups and make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

UNBLND is a global 🌍 social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!


Privacy Policy: 
https://unblnd.com/privacy

Frequently Asked Question:
https://unblnd.com/faq-help-center

Follow us:
https://facebook.com/unblnd
https://twitter.com/unblnd
https://instagram.com/unblnd

If yes, you are in the right place. UNBLND makes it easy to find a group of people who are perfect for you, and you for them. Moved to a new city/country?✈ Want to find new friends? Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink?🥂 Join meetup groups and make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

UNBLND is a global 🌍 social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!


Privacy Policy: 
https://unblnd.com/privacy

Frequently Asked Question:
https://unblnd.com/faq-help-center

Follow us:
https://facebook.com/unblnd
https://twitter.com/unblnd
https://instagram.com/unblnd
https://linkedin.com/company/unblnd/

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!


Privacy Policy: 
https://unblnd.com/privacy

Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Heer's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalize your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not heer to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

title: UNBLND - make friends app

creator: Ubigreat BV
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to meet people who share your interests and make a lasting friendship?


If yes, you are in the right place. UNBLND makes it easy to find a group of people who are perfect for you, and you for them. Moved to a new city/country?✈ Want to find new friends? Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink?🥂 Join meetup groups and make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

UNBLND is a global 🌍 social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!

title: UNBLND - make friends app

creator: Ubigreat BV
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to meet people who share your interests and make a lasting friendship?


If yes, you are in the right place. UNBLND makes it easy to find a group of people who are perfect for you, and you for them. Moved to a new city/country?✈ Want to find new friends? Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink?🥂 Join meetup groups and make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

UNBLND is a global 🌍 social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!


Privacy Policy: 
https://unblnd.com/privacy

Frequently Asked Question:
https://unblnd.com/faq-help-center

Follow us:
https://facebook.com/unblnd
https://twitter.com/unblnd
https://instagram.com/unblnd
https://linkedin.com/company/unblnd/

Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink?🥂 Join meetup groups and make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

UNBLND is a global 🌍 social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE (and No Ads)
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life



YOUR PRIVACY
UNBLND is a trusted environment where people can make friends based on interests. We are not here to invade your life; we want to be there for you whenever you need us. Happy unblnding!


Privacy Policy: 
https://unblnd.com/privacy

Frequently Asked Question:
https://unblnd.com/faq-help-center

Follow us:
https://facebook.com/unblnd
https://twitter.com/unblnd
https://instagram.com/unblnd
https://linkedin.com/company/unblnd/

Do you want to meet people who share your interests and make a lasting friendship?


If yes, you are in the right place. UNBLND makes it easy to find a group of people who are perfect for you, and you for them. Moved to a new city/country?✈ Want to find new friends? Need to practice a new language? Want to try some new activities? Or just want to grab a drink?🥂 Join meetup groups and make friends who share your interests via UNBLND

UNBLND is a global 🌍 social community based on interests building authentic connections through meaningful group experiences

Based on your interests and hobbies, we get you in touch with like-minded people. Get to know them, unbl(i)nd and make plans! After all, that’s what it’s all about, isn’t it? Let’s just do it!

Here's how it works:
Stage 1 – Install app, share your location and set preferred activities
Stage 2 – Tell us about your preferred interest to personalise your profile
Stage 3 – Await our algorithm to add you in relevant groups with (anonymous) people
Stage 4 – Chat within your interest group and plan a meetup
Stage 5 – Meet them and have a real experience!



Not your usual social network. Share real experiences!


Everyone is unique in their own way. Everyone has something that they are passionate about. Everyone has their own niche. Through our way of working, we want to allow you to meet others based on who you are and not what you look like or how many followers you have. We want to help you build true relationships. You will only unveil when YOU are ready for it.



What makes us different from other social networks?


✅ Your profile is never public – Users in your group will only have access to your individual profile when you both agree to unblind.
✅ It’s not meant as a dating app – it’s focused on friendships. Matches are made in groups of three or more. But hey, anything can happen!
✅ We have a super sophisticated and dynamic algorithm that generates unique interest groups based on your input
✅ Our app is totally FREE
✅You have an option to join live videochats in group, before you meet in real life
